name: Pixel Tap Dungeon
description: Pixel Tap Dungeon is a casual dungeon crawling game that you can play with one hand! (Mouse or finger depending on device.) Navigate through the dungeon by revealing tiles. Fight monsters and spring traps that you find along the way to allow you to reveal even more of the dungeon. Find the key to open the stairs to the next floor. How far into the dungeon can you delve?
